Headline: #9 Ashland Temporary Southbound Reroute near Fulton/Ashland
ShortDescription: Southbound 9 Ashland buses are temporarily rerouted via Ashland, Grand, Ogden, Carroll, and Ashland due to, street blockage near Fulton/Ashland.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #9 Ashland buses are temporarily rerouted via Ashland, Grand, Ogden, Carroll, and Ashland due to, street blockage near Fulton/Ashland.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Red Line Delays
ShortDescription: Red Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier unauthorized person on the tracks at Fullerton. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Red Line trains are running with residual delays following an earlier unauthorized person on the tracks at Fullerton.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #81 Lawrence Temporary Reroute at Lawrence/Leclaire
ShortDescription: 81 Lawrence buses are temporarily rerouted via Lawrence, Cicero, Elston, Foster, Mailwaukee, & into Jefferson Park Terminal.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#81 Lawrence buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Lawrence, Cicero, Elston, Foster, Mailwaukee, and into Jefferson Park Terminal, due to street blockage near Lawrence/Leclaire.

Allow extra travel time.
